Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The officers are on duty 24 hours a day seven days a week to ensure a safe environment for all the students, faculty and staff.
If you like to be outdoors, or near the beach...this campus is perfect for you!
With the location (Near the beach), along with the home feel, you can't go wrong. It's a beautiful campus with great professors who really care.
Get involved with clubs or new activities that you normally wouldn't do. The University offers indoor and outdoor activities daily!
With the choice of meal plan, students get a bang for their buck. The variety of food is incredible!

Living on campus is a great way for students to get connected to the University. all of the staff members are there to promote the academic success and personal development of the students. Students have the opportunity to learn new thing and meet new people as well.

To graduate with a baccalaureate degree from the University of South Carolina Beaufort students must complete a program of general study designed to provide them with a well rounded education. Making it slightly difficult but defiantly possible to do with hard work and dedication.
If you're struggling in a class go to tutoring before its to late! Oh, and guess what! It's free!

The University of South Carolina-Beaufort is a beautiful, welcoming and diverse Campus. I would rate the University high based on its location, wide range on academic choices and the diversity of people to gain more knowledge of different cultures.

textAfterTable: Will enjoy being here Everything is really new and high tech. The apartments are really nice too. Login to rate or flag the reviews Bryanna from Trenton, SC 01/18/2011 Reviewer is A current student here. 5 out of 5 people found this review useful. 3 of 26 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you want a small, personal university this is the one for you! Tips for prospective students Don't be afraid to ask questions and interact with others. Try something new, be willing to meet new people, and attend the various activities offered on campus Bang for the buck The dorms resemble an average apartment with a spacious living room, full kitchen, two bathrooms, and many students have their own room, and every apartment contains a washer and dryer. There is even twenty-four hour campus security. For less than a fourth the cost of a tuition
